item.title: Install XAMPP in Mac
item.author: Lingyun Yang
item.description: Install XAMPP in mac When trying to install XAMPP in mac with a M1 chip. Apache server cann’t start. Solution are as follows: check the port occupation. sudo lsof -i -n stop the build in Apache server in mac sudo apachectl stop restart XAMPP and run the Apache server, it will works
